Text:
This is Italy`s response to the Mad Max craze during the early 80`s. Complete with the so called rape scene, where George Eastman is performing sodomy on our hero. This release is uncut ofcourse.

Co-Starring Anna Kanakis(A heartstopper, she looks totally stunning!)

I mislabeled this torrent as a Porn Movie, probarly the reason why it has 97 Leeches.... Sorry guys, this is not Porn......... 

Who needs porn when you can watch the beatiful Anna Kanakis in this movie :D
down to 91 after my last comment..... lol
I loved this movie.. Its the best useless movie ever
